titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the King at White-Hall, November 5, 1667 by ... George Lords Bishop of Winton ...
titleStmt.author: Morley, George, 1597-1684.

notesStmt.note: This item also appears at reel 542:4b as the second item of Morley's Several treatises, written upon several occasions ..., 1683.
Item at reel 1018:7 identified as Wing M2795 (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed., which identifies this as part of M2796).
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
